text.tspan: Global mine production of minerals, 1901 to 2023

Measured in tonnes of mined, rather than
refined
production.
Data source: USGS - Mineral Commodity Summaries (2024); USGS - Historical Statistics for Mineral and Material Commodities (2023); BGS
